name: Silent Hill: HD Collection
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish. Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual". Introducing Silent Hill 2 and Silent Hill 3 with enhancements including true high-definition graphics! Experience the early era of Silent Hill as a true genre-defining experience with the added value of two games.
